apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: Public key to access Nucleus Edge APIs. It is required to count with a valid Google Access token.

header.name: Authorization
header.description: Header Param Description. Obtain a valid access token here. https://apigeesc.atlassian.net/wiki/display/NUCLEUS/API+Security

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Number of items to be returned. Default 100 and Max 100.

where.name: where
where.description: Filter items by more specific criteria. Check Sequelize.js Querying syntax along with describe parameter in Base64 encoding. Return all orgs containing the word 'net' in it would be represented as '{"org_name": {"$like":"%net%"}}' and in base64 as %7B%22org_name%22%3A%20%7B%22%24like%22%3A%22%25net%25%22%7D%7D.

stacktrace.name: stacktrace
stacktrace.description: Useful for development purposes. Returns more information about the error.

attributes.name: attributes
attributes.description: Include only attributes from this list. See describe parameter to retrieve a list of valid attributes. e.g. ["org_name","account_id","paid"]

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Used for paginating records of a collection.

describe.name: describe
describe.description: Returns the description of the resource. Columns ATM.
